meanings.definition: Located above or on top of the kidneys.
meanings.sent1: The suprarenal glands sit atop the kidneys.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the suprarenal position of the glands during the anatomy class.
meanings.sent3: The suprarenal view from the hill made the city look tiny.
meanings.sent4: Her suprarenal presence in the room commanded attention.
meanings.sent5: The suprarenal location of the treehouse provided a breathtaking view of the valley.

meanings.definition: Relating to or affecting the adrenal glands.
meanings.sent1: The suprarenal medication helped regulate her adrenal gland function.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the importance of maintaining a healthy suprarenal balance for overall well-being.
meanings.sent3: His suprarenal sense of humor always lightened the mood in the office.
meanings.sent4: The suprarenal support from her friends gave her the strength to overcome the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The suprarenal energy boost from the drink kept him alert during the long drive.
